nerfw.nerfw module

class nerfw.nerfw.NerFW[source]

Bases: LoggerBase

Main class for Ner framework

run(script, debug=False)[source]

Runs a game :param script: Script to run :param debug: Debug mode :return: None

set_allowed_users(users: str | list)[source]

Sets list of allowed users :param users: path to file with list of users. Or list of users :return: None

set_background(background: str)[source]

Sets background :param background: Path to background :return: None

set_login_method(method: str)[source]

Sets login method :param method: Login method. Can be “Default”, “GitHub” :return: None

set_name(name: str)[source]

Sets name of the game :param name: Name of the game :return: None
